document_title: Salivary gland inflammation: Symptoms, causes and treatments
subsection_content: Salivary gland inflammation is a condition in which the salivary glands become infected, causing swelling and pain. The cause may be due to a viral infection or a blocked salivary duct, creating conditions for disease-causing bacteria to operate.(1)
subsection_title: viem tuyen nuoc bot.json. What is sialadenitis?
subsection_data:
viem tuyen nuoc bot.json. What is sialadenitis?
Salivary gland inflammation is a condition in which the salivary glands become infected, causing swelling and pain. The cause may be due to a viral infection or a blocked salivary duct, creating conditions for disease-causing bacteria to operate.(1)
